name: Frail Faces
description:
Frail Faces is an arcade game with unique game mechanics in which you have to find masks to become different characters and fight your way as far as possible through the hordes of the void fiends. Gather a squad that will be able to stop Lacuna, the cosmic horror that is responsible for the destruction of Wortelm and is about to consume the rest of the world.

  • Find up to 70 masks - characters, each with their own unique characteristics
  • Dynamic combat system in which you have to face more than two dozen types of enemies
  • More than a hundred unique items, whose unusual properties significantly change the course of the game
  • Interact with objects whose effects can range from simple improvements to making complex fateful decisions
